Params: {3: 'The blinding light sears painful trails across your retinas as the spiral tower replays its horrifying movements in endless slow motion.'}

{3: "The moment you step into the Hetero Tower, countless bizarre information floods in like a bursting dam, overwhelming your mind's protective barriers. Intense pain strikes your brain as if high-voltage electricity is coursing from head to toe."}
{3: 'Towering crimson crystals stand within the Hetero Tower, its interior contorting and warping to cast one distorted shadow after another.'}
{3: 'Within your consciousness, colossal waves surge, brewing storms in the depths. Your nerves tremble incessantly, orchestrating a symphony of sorrowful wails.'}
{3: 'Blood trickles between your clenched teeth as the Punishing Virus concentration spikes uncontrollably. Just as your legs start to give way—'}
{3: 'Faintly, you feel a pair of familiar, gentle hands supporting your back.'}
{3: 'Then, the projection vanishes as suddenly and silently as it appeared.'}
{3: 'Complete silence fills the Hetero Tower, with no sign of any life forms present.'}
{3: 'Ishmael shows up silently at one side.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'To be precise, that was a projection she left in your Mind Beacon...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As you speak, jagged crystals grow chaotically, resembling strange amber spreading across the sky, completely encasing your tiny figure within.'}
